claims.claim: BigQuery-powered audiences achieved 2.6x higher conversion rates in owned media
claims.quote: BigQuery-powered audiences delivered a 2.6x higher conversion rate compared to other first-party audiences in owned media

claims.claim: BigQuery-powered audiences generated 2.4x greater conversion volume
claims.quote: Conversion volume for BigQuery-powered audiences was 2.4x greater than conversions from other first-party audiences

claims.claim: Paid media campaigns doubled conversion volume with 1.9x higher conversion rates
claims.quote: Paid media campaigns' conversion volume doubled and conversion rates were 1.9x higher with BigQuery powered audiences

claims.claim: Cost per acquisition dropped by 36% using BigQuery-powered audiences
claims.quote: Cost per acquisition (CPA) dropped by 36% when using BigQuery-powered audiences compared to regular first-party audiences

claims.claim: Application deployment time improved from 8 days to 8 minutes
claims.quote: Our goal was to improve from days of work to just minutes when deploying an application across all environments
